ModMetaData.name: Guns and Grenades Tech Removal
ModMetaData.author: KapTaiN_KaVerN
ModMetaData.description:
<size=20>For all your medieval or tribal plays</size>
Remove all guns (and grenades) in pawn generation process AND remove all mechanoids and spacers factions AND makes resting factions to not siege you (can't find another way for removing mortars) - You still have to use scenario options if you want to completely remove mechanoids events(poisonship and psychicship) and colonists starting guns
<size=20>Credit</size>
Thank you to Reddit User kcirdor for the testing and his insights
